Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: At the time of treatment , she was on continuous renal replacement therapy due to sequelae of tumor lysis syndrome ( TLS ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| renal replacement therapy |
| sequelae of tumor lysis syndrome (TLS) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| tumor lysis syndrome (TLS) |

Explanation:

* "Renal replacement therapy" is a medical treatment, not a disease.
* "Sequelae" refers to the aftereffects or consequences of a disease or injury, not a disease itself. In this case, it is specifically referring to the aftereffects of tumor lysis syndrome (TLS).

Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: At the time of treatment , she was on continuous renal replacement therapy due to sequelae of tumor lysis syndrome ( TLS ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| renal replacement therapy |
| tumor lysis syndrome (TLS) |

In this paragraph, the two chemical entities mentioned are "renal replacement therapy" and "tumor lysis syndrome (TLS)". "Renal replacement therapy" is a medical treatment that replaces the normal blood-purifying functions of the kidneys when they fail. "Tumor lysis syndrome (TLS)" is a potentially life-threatening condition that can occur after cancer treatment, when large numbers of cancer cells are killed rapidly, releasing their contents into the bloodstream.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| tumor lysis syndrome (TLS) |

In this paragraph, the only chemical entity mentioned is "tumor lysis syndrome (TLS)". "Renal replacement therapy" is a medical treatment, not a chemical.
